channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Accept Stripe Payments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Accept Stripe Payments

item.title: CVE-2022-2194|2024-08-03T00:32:08.626Z -- unknown -- accept%20stripe%20payments
item.description: The Accept Stripe Payments WordPress plugin before 2.0.64 does not sanitize and escape some of its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
